This came up tangentially in bug 706204.

For example, currently the web console menuitem stays enabled & visible when opening the downloads window. Page Source is still visible but disabled. All other items are hidden (even error console, which doesn't make sense).

Personally, I think they should be visible but disabled.

This is probably OS X only, but I haven't looked at the menu stuff for win/lin in a while.
